titleStmt.title: The Declaration and apology of the Protestant people that is, of the noblemen, barrons, gentlemen, burgesses, and commons of all sorts, now in armes within the kingdom of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Earl of, 1629-1685.
